questions.text: At the beginning of the episode Cat Grant stopped and got her own latte, what was even stranger?
questions.correct: She bought one for Kara as well.
options: Cat had spilled it all over herself and wasn't upset.
Cat arrived three hours late to the office and never explained why.
She bought doughnuts for the staff as well.
questions.explanation:
She bought one for Kara as well.

	She brought Kara a pumpkin spiced latte. Cat was happy about it making the stop to grab the drinks. On a typical morning Cat expected Kara or another underling to be waiting by her private elevator with a drink in hand.

Maxwell Lord.

	She was a comatose "Jane Doe", who was then genetically altered to fight against Supergirl. She became known as "Bizarro Supergirl" during the episode.

questions.text: Who did Kara go on a date with?
questions.explanation:
Adam.

	Adam Foster, Cat Grant's adult son, had been introduced a few episodes earlier. He had asked her out in the previous episode. They went out once before realizing they had no future as a couple.

Cat.

	Cat Grant named her Bizarro. Bizarro was one of seven "Jane Does" taken in by Lord's company Prometheus. He took some of Supergirl's DNA and used it to infuse them with her powers.

questions.text: Kryptonite turned the "bizarro" version of Supergirl into a monsterish looking creature.
questions.explanation:
True.

	It made her look just like the Bizarro Superman shown in other mediums. Her powers were a mirror image to Supergirl's, and the Kryptonite actually made her stronger. The alien rock also made her lose (parts) of her mind and become a bit of a simpleton.

James.

	He thought it was Kara returning after they had just had a moment. Instead Bizarro landed on the balcony, screamed, and flew off with him. James admitted to Bizarro that he loved Supergirl, after she told him that Supergirl loved him.

questions.text: Maxwell Lord was killed during an argument with Bizarro.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He was however arrested. Alex Danvers had him arrested because he had surveillance on herself and Kara, and knew too much about the DEO operations. Hank Henshaw was not happy.

questions.correct: Synthetic blue Kryptonite was created to use against her.
options: She flew herself into the sun.
She had no powers when the sun was down.
Supergirl simply overpowered her after a battle.
questions.explanation:
Synthetic blue Kryptonite was created to use against her.

	Since the green Kryptonite had made her stronger, a fake blue Kryptonite was created to be the exact opposite. Bizarro was beaten and then put into a medical coma. The same state that she was in when Maxwell found her.

Melissa Benoist.

	The same actress that played Supergirl. She pulled double duty for the episode, playing both roles for the episode. Benoist was one of the stars of the later seasons of "Glee" before landing the role on "Supergirl".

questions.text: Where did Adam go at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Opal City.

	Opal City is where he grew up. He promised to visit more often now that he and his mother, Cat, were on speaking terms. Despite that promise, he wasn't featured on any more episodes in the first season.
